content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Processing at (1, -60)
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Furnace Array at (1, 1)
- Stone furnace at (1.0, 1.0)
- Stone furnace at (3.0, 1.0)
- Wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)

### Furnace Complex at (2, 7)
- Stone furnaces at (2.0, 7.0), (4.0, 7.0)
- Burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5), (3.5, 9.5)
- Wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5), (4.5, 9.5)

### Copper Cable Production at (14.5, 14.5)
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Wooden chests at (11.5, 14.5), (17.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserters at (12.5, 14.5), (16.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production at (21.5, 15.5)
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserters at (19.5, 15.5), (23.5, 15.5)
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 15.5)

### Water System
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5), (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water system
- Boiler at (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)

### Transport System
- Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities
- Complex network of inserters and chests for material handling

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- Ensure proper connection points between pipes and machines
- Verify fluid flow direction in pipe networks
- Check that all pipe segments are properly connected without gaps

### Power system errors
- Ensure power producers (steam engines) are properly connected to power consumers
- Verify steam supply to power generators
- Check electrical pole connections form a complete network

### Production facility errors
- Ensure assembling machines have all required input materials
- Verify inserters are properly positioned to reach input/output positions
- Check recipe requirements match available resources

### Resource errors
- Keep burner devices fueled to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
- Monitor and manage furnace input/output to prevent blocking
- Ensure proper resource flow through transport belts
